assertion: When I got my first car, a friend and I would pretend to be cops; park up, eat burgers, and tail cars we'd picked out of the traffic.
Paid by Neil to propose to Neil's girlfriend while dressed as an Ewok.
To prove his manhood, he destroyed his womble in front of Neil.
Looks after Neil's parrot when Neil's on holiday and walks the parrot.
For the last 30 years my breakfast regime has never altered. I have one bowl of porridge, one large banana, and half a pint of lager.
I can smell if there's a dead fly in the room.
